title: Andromeda Breakthrough - complete season 1 (colorized) (1962, BBC sci-fi, imdb score: 6.9)

sources.title: Andromeda Breakthrough Bbc Sci Fi Episode 1 720p
sources.description: The Andromeda Breakthrough was a 1962 sequel to the popular  BBC TV  science fiction serial  A for Andromeda , again written by  Fred Hoyle  and  John Elliot .
